body:
Most server, when you vote, you get rewards.

But on Avicus, we vote, but get no rewards

So how about when we vote, we could get like 500k or 1000k. <----- Does really have to be the rewards, could be different. 

Post what the rewards should be!

Please... nothing OP
body_tagged:

title: Avicus Voting system

replies.body: 500k or 1000k/1million credits...is this a typo/misunderstanding orrrrr...?
replies.body_tagged: 500k or 1000k/1million credits...is this a typo/misunderstanding orrrrr...?

reply_to.body: 500k or 1000k/1million credits...is this a typo/misunderstanding orrrrr...?
reply_to.body_tagged: 500k or 1000k/1million credits...is this a typo/misunderstanding orrrrr...?

replies.body: I like this idea! Or we could get like a voter badge after voting a certain amount of times
replies.body_tagged: I like this idea! Or we could get like a voter badge after voting a certain amount of times

replies.body:
Maybe the top voter of the month? And the badge would last for the next month. 

@OP I like this idea, but you shouldn't get that much credits for voting. If you get 500 credits per vote and you vote each day 1 time you'll get 15k credits per month. Maybe between 50 - 150 credits per vote.
replies.body_tagged:
Maybe the top voter of the month? And the badge would last for the next month. 

@OP I like this idea, but you shouldn't get that much credits for voting. If you get 500 credits per vote and you vote each day 1 time you'll get 15k credits per month. Maybe between 50 - 150 credits per vote.

reply_to.body: I like this idea! Or we could get like a voter badge after voting a certain amount of times
reply_to.body_tagged: I like this idea! Or we could get like a voter badge after voting a certain amount of times

replies.body: It'd be good if like for the first vote that month you get 100 credits. The next day you'd get 110. And then 120 etc. till the end of the month when it should reset. However if you miss a day of voting during the month, it also resets back to 100 credits.
replies.body_tagged: It'd be good if like for the first vote that month you get 100 credits. The next day you'd get 110. And then 120 etc. till the end of the month when it should reset. However if you miss a day of voting during the month, it also resets back to 100 credits.

replies.body:
Lol this has been suggested so many times.

I'd say a special (permanent) badge for the person/people who vote the most each month. 

I recommend using this symbol.
☑

A 100 credits per vote incentive would be good.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
300 per vote

10 votes=1000 creds
25 votes=2000 creds
50 votes=5000 creds
100 votes=10000 creds

1/5=100 extra creds
1/20=500 extra creds
1/100(gap cuzynot)=Special badge
1/10000=Free PERMANENT rank

EDIT: Vote rewards are subject to change depending on how much voting websites Avicus is part of.
